articles.description: GENEVA: The World Health Organization (WHO) urged countries to press on with efforts to contain the novel coronavirus, noting the pandemic was worsening globally and had not peaked in central America.
articles.content: GENEVA: The World Health Organization (WHO) urged countries to press on with efforts to contain the novel coronavirus, noting the pandemic was worsening globally and had not peaked in central America… [+2570 chars]
